posts.name: Bekale
posts.cooked:
Hi,

I am trying to test my robot but Driver Station doesn’t detect the joystick at all. I tried to rescan, as recommended, the DS over and over again but I still have the same issue. Any help please.

Thank you

posts.name: Wes
posts.cooked: Can the joystick be detected by anything other then driverstation?

posts.name: Dalton Smith
posts.cooked:
On your keyboard, press Win (Windows button) + R

Type joy.cpl

See if the joystick shows up there

If it doesn’t, you can see if the manufacture offers windows drivers, otherwise it is not compatible. The issue being that the joystick does not report itself as Xinput or Dinput compliant.

posts.name: Peter Johnson
posts.cooked: What appears in the joystick list in the DS?  Are there a bunch of greyed out joysticks?  The DS has the ability to “lock” joystick slots.  I think you can double-click to clear the lock?

posts.name: Bekale
posts.cooked:
A bunch of greyed out joysticks joystickErr 817×288 53.8 KB

joystickErr 817×288 53.8 KB

joystickErr 817×288 53.8 KB

posts.name: Bekale
posts.cooked: I double-clicked and I can detect the joystick now. You were right. Thank you
